snippet: A coming court hearing surrounding sexual assault charges against Bill Cosby is likely to pit a former district attorney in Montgomery County, Pa., against the county’s present district attorney.
abstract: Confrontation between political rivals Bruce L Castor Jr and Kevin R Steele is expected at pre-trial hearing for Bill Cosby in Norristown, Pa; Castor, former Montgomery County District Attorney and star witness for defense, says he will testify he made no prosecution deal with Cosby regarding sexual assault of Andrea Constand in 2004; prosecutor Steele, who won his district attorney seat in acrimonious 2016 campaign against Castor, says he will probably cross examine Castor.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and SYDNEY EMBER

lead_paragraph: A coming court hearing surrounding sexual assault charges against Bill Cosby is likely to pit a former district attorney in Montgomery County, Pa., against the county’s present district attorney.

headline.main: Cosby Case Highlights a Rivalry Between Two Lawyers
headline.print_headline: Cosby Case Highlights a Rivalry Between Two Lawyers
